summary: Jean is a clerk in a bank. His colleague Caron is a gambler and gives him the virus. In the casinos, Jean meets Jackie. Their love affair will follow their luck at the roulette.
cast: Jeanne Moreau|Claude Mann|Paul Guers|Henri Nassiet|André Certes|Nicole Chollet|Georges Alban|Conchita Parodi|Jacques Moreau|André Canter|Jean-Pierre Lorrain
title: La bahía de los ángeles
